venue.name: Corner of Cross and Hanover Streets (across from the Greenway in front of Mother Annas)

item.description:
Get ready for Halloween and come out to the North End for the Dark Side tour season finale. An original guided walk through misery, misfortune, malevolence, and murder is based on true historical events that have occurred in Boston.

Disease, mob violence, sick soldiers, armed robbery, pirates, and a touch of organized crime with more body snatching than ever before. You will also learn of the fun things you can do with molasses in the middle of the day.

Winding among the labyrinth of small streets and alleys in the North End at night is a great way to get off the beaten path and explore the nooks and crannies beyond Mike's Pastry.

The tour meets on across from the Greenway on Hanover Street (look for Mother Anna's sign). It is $12 but free to Boston By Foot card-carrying members).
item.name: The Dark Side of Boston
